comments.html: I had a heuristic when troubleshooting that "if the problem was non-deterministic (or close to it), look at layer 2 first". Duplicate MACs, MTU, flapping spanning tree: generally something of that ilk.
comments.name: Greg

comments.html: DHCP has the Interface MTU Option but I doubt all clients honor it. And that wouldn't have helped in this case anyway.
comments.name: Wes Felter
